医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究揭示了南亚和东亚成年人的不同血压模式根据《美国心脏协会高血压》上发表的新研究，居住在英国的南亚和东亚成年人可能有独特的轨迹，可以在他们的生活过程中发展高血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/research-reveals-distinct-blood-pressure-pressure-pressure-pressure-pressns-in-south-asouth-asian-and-ash-and-ast-asian-asian-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/research-reveals-distinct-blood-pressure-press-press-patserns-in-south-asouth-asouth-asian-and-ash-ast--------- and-ast-asian-asian-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a543fe7-d9Ad-46A7-9303-E3BB44D8F334 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 06:41:41 -0500 Research reveals distinct blood pressure patterns in South Asian and East Asian adults
女性更喜欢女性心脏病专家来更好的心脏保健根据美国医师数据仪表板的数据，只有约17％的心脏病学家是女性，是女性医生中最低的专业之一，但心脏病仍然是女性的第一杀手，占女性五分之一的女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/women-prefer-female-female-cardiologists-for-better-heart-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/women-prefer-female-female-cardiologists-for-for-better-henret-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de1A0615-9525-422E-B116-56494FD496F5 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 06:38:00 -0500 Women prefer female cardiologists for better heart care
吸入抗体疗法显示了Covid-19治疗的希望吸入的单克隆抗体IN-006在Covid-19治疗中显示出有望，在健康成年人中具有高气道抗体水平和有利的安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/inhaled-antibody-therapy-shows-shows-promise-promise-for-covid-covid-19-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/inhaled-antibody-therapy-therapy-shows-promise-promise-for-covid-covid-19-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A3EA9758-7A8F-4D04-8C14-14330E12F99C Wed, 12 Feb 2025 05:26:00 -0500 Inhaled antibody therapy shows promise for COVID-19 treatment
万寿菊花：潜在的新超级食品万寿菊富含营养素，提供抗氧化剂，维生素和矿物质，突出了它们作为功能性食品的潜力，以增强健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/marigold-flowers-a-potential-new-superfood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/marigold-flowers-a-potential-new-new-superfood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1EE64B0D-EF45-4FE6-BFF6-BFF6-1CA5AEB358EA Wed, 12 Feb 2025 05:08:00 -0500 Marigold flowers: A potential new superfood

研究人员重点介绍了协作《我的世界》游戏的教育益处南澳大利亚大学的研究人员说，这是全球流行的视频游戏，引起了超过1.41亿活跃玩家的注意，但是Minecraft也可以在塑造儿童的发展，社交互动和认知学习方面发挥重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/researchers-highlight-the-educational-benefits-of-collaborative-minecraft-play.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/researchers-highlight-the-edecational-benefits-benefits-of-collaborative-minecraft-play.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d99E9B0B-5BA0-4664-A6CE-A6CE-A32F29841B90 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 02:28:15 -0500 Researchers highlight the educational benefits of collaborative Minecraft play
大阪大学的研究人员开发了研究免疫调节的创新工具开发有效的治疗方法，并了解免疫系统的机制如何一直对科学家构成挑战。 T细胞是与感染作斗争的前线战士，一直是研究的重点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/osaka-university-university-researchers-develop-innovative-noverative-innovation-took to-study-study-study-immune-regulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/osaka-university-university-researchers-develop-innovention-toovelation-took-took-to-study-study-mmmune-regulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B1B3C27D-F5AA-4A71-86AD-9D71F31F31F8905 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 02:20:47 -0500 Osaka University researchers develop innovative tool to study immune regulation
科学家发现尼古丁戒断背后的大脑机制根据世界卫生组织（WHO）的数据，全球人口中有22％的人吸烟，每年有超过900万种与吸烟有关的死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/scientists-discover-brain-mechanism-behind-nicotine-withdrawal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/scientists-discover-brain-mechanism-behind-nicotine-withdrawal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4df468e-0bc2-4eAc-ac9b-78d25e64f9ac Wed, 12 Feb 2025 02:07:25 -0500 Scientists discover brain mechanism behind nicotine withdrawal
全球平台旨在彻底改变儿童癌症治疗世界卫生组织（WHO）和圣裘德儿童研究医院已经通过全球获得儿童癌症药物的平台开始了在6个试点国家中的2个中的2个试点国家中急需的儿童癌症药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/global-platform-aims-to-revolutions-to-revolutionze-access-coscess-to-childhood-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/global-platform-aims-to-revolution-to-revolutions-to-access-coscess-to-childhood-cancer-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fe3A28E-CC1B-4069-B4A7-5C8C8DFBD0B960 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 01:54:42 -0500 Global platform aims to revolutionize access to childhood cancer treatment
对烟的限制性较小，可以改善公共卫生结果昆士兰州大学的研究人员发现，在新西兰，吸烟率的下降速度是澳大利亚的两倍，这表明对烟雾的限制性监管较少可以改善公共卫生结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/less-restrictive-regulative-nogulative-on-vaping-could-imbrove-public-health-health-compomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/less-restrictive-reculative-on-on-vaping-could-improve-public-health-health-compomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79840CE5-2653-49D7-9BAE-D531F531FD4DC22F Tue, 11 Feb 2025 22:38:56 -0500 Less restrictive regulation on vaping could improve public health outcomes
